name: Json-youtube-player
tagline: A simple JSON driven youtube player that can play videos via channel or custom data.
body:
json-youtube-player =================== A simple JSON driven youtube player that can play videos via channel or custom data. Setup =================== ######1. Include jQuery. ######2. Include ```json-player.js``` ######3. Use the sample HTML snippet: ```HTML

    ``` ###### 4. Style according to your needs or use ```style.css``` ###### 5. Edit ```json-player.js``` to config the player. Such as ```channel``` and ```numberOfVideos``` etc. ```JS player.config = { "channel" : "your_channel_name", "numberOfVideos" : 6, "videoWidth" : 560, "videoHeight" : 315, "playerElement" : "#player_wrap", "videoListElement" : "ul#videos" }; ``` License =================== JSON Youtube Player is Licensed uncder MIT.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
